Assignment 1

Create a web page that contains information from your favourite sport OR sports team OR player. The topic MUST be school appropriate. Gather or create content for this page. The content should be sufficient to fill the screen. If the content is not your own - be sure to properly reference it.

Assignment 5

Write a function isValidURL(url) that checks if a given string is a valid URL. The URL should begin with http:// or https:// and should have a domain name (e.g., example.com).

Write a function findAndReplace(text, target, replacement) that replaces all occurrences of a target word (case insensitive) in the given string text with the provided replacement word. Do not use the replaceAll() method.
